title: About the new client
body:
I've had the Alpha for a while but rarely played on it due to a VERY significant problem.
Now I'm forced to play on it as when I tried opening the old client it redirected me to new one and opened that.

The problem is lag and it hasn't fixed in the slightest ever since I tried playing on in 1-2 weeks ago
Everything is laggy but ESPECIALLY champ select and trying to accept a game from queue. I couldn't even change my masteries in champ select because it was too laggy and I had a couple of minutes to do it. Now, I usually didn't care about this as I reported it to riot and just used old client, but I'm forced to use this. The lag this client is giving me makes this game almost unplayable. 

On the old client it was super fast and no problems, but as soon as I try to use the new one it goes down the shitter. 

The only real option I have is to try to stop playing this game at this point due to me not being able to accept most queues and not even being able to change masteries. In game it's fine just out of it is a mess. 

I'm not one for complaining especially on boards but a lot of my friends are getting this too and the fact I'm now forced to play with this turns me off playing in general.

replies.body:
Hi

Sorry to hear you are having issues on the updated client.  Please make sure to send in a bug report about that (using the button bottom right of the client), so that the team get the right data about its performance on various systems.

That said - you certainly don't need to stop playing!  During Open Beta, you can still launch the legacy client - the steps to do that are in our [Open Beta FAQs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788#h1q5)

Cheers
Mindstar

Is there an issue with actual MS lag with this client? I usually get 38MS from southeast melbourne. Since I downloaded this client and used it I am on a 58average which spikes to 70-90MS.
